Hi Britt,

Hope you had an amazing start of the year. Yes, we are already working on it. I'll notify you on the initial email once it's done.

full_threads.body:
Hi guys!


Hope you're well 😊 Just forwarding this on as I'm not sure if you're back from leave yet.


Thanks!
Britt


Brittany Tudela

From: Brittany Tudela <Brittany.Tudela@Royalrehab.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 11 January 2021 3:11 PM
To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: Heath Maguire <team@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: RE: sargood covid update pages


Hi Heath!


Hope you're well and that you had a break over Christmas and New Years!


Good news for Sargood as we're set to reopen again now that the Northern Beaches is no longer a hotspot.


Could we please have the covid banner changed back to "Read our Covid-19 Safety Measures" (think that's what it was before?)
And the copy on the page to be updated to:

Sargood on Collaroy continues to monitor developments, take precautionary measures and strictly follow the guidelines of relevant authorities including the NSW Ministry of Health with regard to COVID-19. The health and wellbeing of our guests and staff members is our top priority. Please read the important information below.

Please do not visit our facility if:

  • You feel unwell in any way,
  • You have been to any of the locations or travelled on nominated public transport routes, during the time and date indicated, in the "Self-isolate and get tested immediately if you've been to these locations" or "Monitor for symptoms if you've been to these locations" or "Public transport routes" tables at NSW Government - Latest news and updates.
  • You have travelled internationally in the last 14 days,
  • You have visited any of the NSW hotspots as identified on the Australian Government website https://www.nsw.gov.au/covid-19/latest-news-and-updates,
  • You have travelled to any of the interstate locations identified as having restrictions on the NSW Government website https://www.nsw.gov.au/covid-19/what-you-can-and-cant-do-under-rules/border-restrictions.
  • You have been in contact with anyone with a confirmed or suspected case of COVID-19.

Conditions of stay:

Please note: we are currently taking bookings up to 31 March 2021.

  • Guests must pre-book their stays
  • Pre-screening calls will be made 48-72 hours before the arrival of all guests.
  • SMS messages will be sent to all guests 24 hours before arrival to remind them that if they are feeling unwell, they will not be permitted to come. Guests can cancel without charge.
  • COVID-19 screening will take place for all guests upon arrival.
  • Guests who reside in hotspot areas or who have visited listed venues on the NSW Health website are not permitted to stay.
  • If any guest develops symptoms during their stay, they will have to have a COVID test, and return home with accompanying travellers immediately.
  • No non-staying visitors (including personal carers if they do not stay on site) are permitted on site.
  • Practice social distancing - stay 1.5 metres from others.
  • Cough and sneeze into your elbow.
  • Regularly use hand sanitiz­er which is available throughout our facility.
  • Masks to be worn in all common areas, and in guest room when care/therapy is being provided.
  • Communal kitchen is closed. Guests are to consume all meals in their rooms using their kitchenettes.
  • No events to be held or social gatherings in common areas.
  • Water based recreation allowed at a 1:1 ratio.
  • Other recreation is allowed at a 1:2 ratio if the activity allows for masks to be worn for the duration
  • Gym, EP or PT sessions must be pre-booked with a maximum 4 people (2 clients and 2 staff) at any time. Masks are to be worn for the duration of these sessions.


Thank you for your understanding during this period; restrictions will be lifted when safe to do so. We look forward to welcoming you back to Sargood on Collaroy.


Could we also have the pop up on the booking page show the same info?


Thanks!
Britt 😊


Brittany Tudela
Marketing Specialist

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 18 December 2020 4:20 PM
To: Brittany Tudela <Brittany.Tudela@Royalrehab.com.au>
Cc: Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>; Heath Maguire <team@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: sargood covid update pages


Hi Britt,

I'm so sorry to hear about this. What a shame!

We have updated the ribbon text and created a new page with the below copy. Here is the link: https://sargoodoncollaroy.com/conditions-of-stay-2/

Please let me know if you would like any other changes.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

On 18 Dec 2020, at 2:56 pm, Brittany Tudela <Brittany.Tudela@Royalrehab.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Hope you're well and not too busy in the lead up to Christmas!

Unfortunately due to the recent covid outbreak here on the beaches, we're having to close Sargood once again!

We don't want to lose the content on our current pop up and covid ribbon, so would you please be able to create copies of these pages, and hide them?
We will then need a new ribbon and pop up to replace it with the following message:

Due to the recent outbreak of COVID-19 cases on the Northern Beaches of Sydney, and the recommendations by NSW Health to cancel all unnecessary travel, we have decided to temporarily close Sargood on Collaroy.

Our priority is the safety of our guests, members and staff. We are committed to playing our part in helping the community contain this outbreak and look forward to reopening when it is safe to do so.


All reservations between 18th and 22nd December will be cancelled and our staff will be in contact with you if you had a booking for this period. Club Sargood will also be closed, and a separate email will go to members and those with EP sessions. Please note that there is a strong possibility this period of closure will be extended, but we will be in touch when more information is known.


Thank you for your understanding, and please stay safe.


Would you be able to help us with this?

Thanks so much!
Britt

Brittany Tudela
Marketing Specialist

Sargood on Collaroy | 1 Brissenden Avenue, Collaroy NSW 2097
t: +61 2 9808 9602 | m: 0466 668 276 | e: brittany.tudela@sargoodoncollaroy.com.au |
